subject: Mathematics
question_en: A point P lies on the line 2x - 5y = 3. The distance of point P from the origin O is
question_hi: एक बिंदु P लाइन 2x - 5y = 3 पर पड़ता है। मूल बिंदु O से बिंदु P की दूरी है
explanation_en: Dikhaaya jaata hai ki line 2x - 5y = 3 ka sanrachna 2i - 5j ke sanrachna vikalp hai. Isliye, yeh line vector 2i - 5j ke sanrachna vikalp hai. Dikhaaya jaata hai ki origin se yeh line ki dhoori 3√2 hai.
explanation_hi: आगाहि ल्ग षेसा सि षि सिश्र 2x - 5y = 3 ka sanrachna 2i - 5j ke sanrachna vikalp hai. Isliye, yeh line vector 2i - 5j ke sanrachna vikalp hai. Dikhaaya jaata hai ki mool bhaag se yeh line ki dhoori 3√2 hai.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: In a triangle ABC, if D and E are the midpoints of BC and AC respectively. DE is parallel to AB and DE = 1/3 AB. Find the ratio BD : DC
question_hi: एक त्रिभुज ABC में यदि D और E BC और AC के बीच के मध्य बिंदु हैं तो DE का AB से समानांतर है और DE = 1/3 AB है। BD : DC का अनुपात ज्ञात करें
explanation_en: Yadi AD = x, AB = 2x, aur DC = 2x. Toh, DE = 1/3(2x) = 2x/3. Isliye, BD = 2x + 2x/3 = 8x/3, aur DC = 2x. Isliye, BD : DC ka anupaat 8x/3 : 2x = 4 : 3 hai.
explanation_hi: यदि AD = x, AB = 2x, aur DC = 2x. Toh, DE = 1/3(2x) = 2x/3. Isliye, BD = 2x + 2x/3 = 8x/3, aur DC = 2x. Isliye, BD : DC ka anupaat 8x/3 : 2x = 4 : 3 hai.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: In a right-angled triangle ABC, if tan A = 1/√3 and tan B = √3. Find the value of sin A
question_hi: एक समकोणी त्रिभुज ABC में, यदि tan A = 1/√3 और tan B = √3. तो sin A का मान ज्ञात करें
explanation_en: Dikhaaya jaata hai ki tan A = 1/√3 aur tan B = √3. Isliye, sin A = cos B. Isliye, sin A = cos(π/3) = 1/2.
explanation_hi: आगाहि ल्ग षेसा सि ष = 1/√3 सि ष ि ष = √3. Isliye, सषा सि = क ि ष. Isliye, सषा सि = क(मि/ष) = 1/2.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If a, b, c are the roots of the equation x^3 - 6x^2 + 11x - 6 = 0, then find the value of (a + b + c)^2
question_hi: यदि a, b, c एक समीकरण x^3 - 6x^2 + 11x - 6 = 0 की मूल्य हैं, तो (a + b + c)^2 का मान ज्ञात करें
explanation_en: Dikhaaya jaata hai ki a + b + c = 6 aur ab + bc + ca = 11. Isliye, (a + b + c)^2 = (6)^2 - 2(ab + bc + ca) = 36 - 22 = 14.
explanation_hi: आगाहि ल स्ग ष्र ल + स ि + स = 6 स ि ल स + स ि स + स ह ल = 11. Isliye, सषा सि हा ल = ल + स ि + स = 6 स ा हा = 36 - 22 = 14.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If x^2 + 2x + 3 = (x + 1)^2 + k, then find the value of k
question_hi: यदि x^2 + 2x + 3 = (x + 1)^2 + k, तो k का मान ज्ञात करें
explanation_en: Dikhaaya jaata hai ki x^2 + 2x + 3 = x^2 + 2x + 1 + k. Isliye, k = 3 - 1 = 2.
explanation_hi: आगाहि ल्ग ष्र ल + 2ल + 3 = लषा ल + 1 ल + स. Isliye, स = 3 - 1 = 2.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: The mean of 5 numbers is 16. If 3 is added to each of the numbers, then find the new mean
question_hi: 5 संख्याओं का औसत 16 है। यदि प्रत्येक संख्या में 3 जोड़ा जाता है, तो नई औसत ज्ञात करें
explanation_en: Dikhaaya jaata hai ki mean = (sum of numbers) / 5. Isliye, (sum of numbers) = 16 * 5 = 80. Isliye, new mean = (80 + 3*5) / 5 = 17.
explanation_hi: आगाहि ल्ग 5 ला स्ग 16. Isliye, ल ह ला = 16 व. Isliye, ल ह ला = 80. Isliye, ल ह ला = स व (80 + ह व) / व = 17.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: Two dice are rolled. What is the probability that the sum of the numbers on the dice is 7
question_hi: दो अंकित कوب्बले गिराए जाते हैं। दो अंकों के योग 7 होने की संभावना ज्ञात करें
explanation_en: Dikhaaya jaata hai ki total outcomes = 6 * 6 = 36. Aur, favorable outcomes = (1,6), (2,5), (3,4), (4,3), (5,2), (6,1) = 6. Isliye, probability = 6/36 = 1/6.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If f(x) = sin x, then find the derivative of f(x) with respect to x
question_hi: यदि f(x) = sin x, तो f(x) का व्युत्क्रम के साथ अनुसंधान करना है
explanation_en: Dikhaaya jaata hai ki f'(x) = cos x.
explanation_hi: आगाहि ल्ग सा ला = cos x.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If y = 2x^2 - 5x + 1, then find the second derivative of y with respect to x
question_hi: यदि y = 2x^2 - 5x + 1, तो y का दूसरा व्युत्क्रम x के साथ अनुसंधान करना है
explanation_en: Dikhaaya jaata hai ki y' = 4x - 5, aur y'' = 4.
